title: Remove newsletter subscribe component and 'Welcome to our game' text from Landing page

requirements.summary: Remove the newsletter signup/subscribe component (email input and Subscribe button) and any 'Welcome to our game' heading or text from the Landing page, while preserving the game logo, CMS-driven description paragraph, and 'View Press Kit' CTA button
acceptanceCriteria: The newsletter email input and Subscribe button are no longer rendered on the Landing page.
Any 'Welcome to our game' heading or label text is no longer visible on the Landing page.
The game logo (gamelogo.png) remains displayed at natural/responsive size.
The CMS-driven game description paragraph remains visible.
The 'View Press Kit' CTA button remains visible and navigates to /press-kit.
No layout regressions or broken spacing on the Landing page.

file_operations.description: Remove the newsletter signup form (email input field and Subscribe button) and any 'Welcome to our game' heading or text from the component. Retain the game logo image (frontend/public/assets/gamelogo.png), the CMS-driven game description paragraph fetched via useAboutText, and the 'View Press Kit' CTA button that navigates to /press-kit. Ensure no layout regressions occur after removal.
